name: Santa: The Cursed Bag
description:
Your bag... it has cursed you! The bag requires souls. The need, the desire, it's overwhelming. The children want presents, but instead, you will capture their souls and make them suffer for eternity.

Themes: 

  • Cursemas Eve

Achievements: 

  • INNOVATION! - Your game is a battle royale
  • Healthy Living - Sleep for 8 hours per night, get an hour of exercise, and only eat healthy food for the duration of the jam.
  • Maverick - Your team size is 1.
